mil7.7.10:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘tacchakassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.7.10:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, tacchako kalasuttam anulometva rukkham tacchati;
mil7.7.10:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena jinasasanamanulomayitva silapathaviyam patitthahitva saddhahatthena pannavasim gahetva kilesa tacchetabba.
mil7.7.10:1.4: Idam, maharaja, tacchakassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.10:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, tacchako pheggum apaharitva saramadiyati;
mil7.7.10:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sassatam ucchedam tam jivam tam sariram annam jivam annam sariram taduttamam annaduttamam akatamabhabbam apurisakaram abrahmacariyavasam sattavinasam navasattapatubhavam sankharasassatabhavam yo karoti, so patisamvedeti, anno karoti, anno patisamvedeti, kammaphaladassana ca kiriyaphaladitthi ca iti evarupani ceva annani ca vivadapathani apanetva sankharanam sabhavam paramasunnatam nirihanijjivatam accantam sunnatam adiyitabbam.
mil7.7.10:2.3: Idam, maharaja, tacchakassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
